author: matthiasksieber
title: Case Study: Yomi.ai & Ada Pay
description: There are no clear incentives for established small business owners to accept ADA as payment.
solution: A case study that illustrates the migration of a small business from accepting fiat to ADA.
experience: Small business owner, Loxe Inc. team, experienced and hackathon winning group of Plutus developers, and startup-experienced web developers.
